upgrade.firmware_large: The uploaded file is too large.
upgrade.platform_unpass: The firmware is not compatible with this device.
upgrade.not_gl: This is not official released firmware.
upgrade.old_version: The uploaded firmware version is older than the current version.
upgrade.advised_not_keep_setting: Kernel version will be upgraded. You are advised not to retain your current settings.
upgrade.unknown_version: This is an unknown version, is 3rd-party firmware or the version is old.
upgrade.sysupgrade_test_failed: Testing the firmware with sysupgrade failed.
upgrade.keep_setting_tips: Current settings will be retained. You will be prompted to reinstall any User installed packages after the upgrade has completed.
upgrade.accepted_rc_tips: 您已接受预览计划，有问题请联系我们
